title: export_integration_EVdir — export_integration_EV
text: function export integration variables set EV files. two excel files inputs (paths, parameters export).  exports go directory automatically named date.  directory export directory listed DirNameFile.  EVfile saved process.

title: export_integration_EVdir — export_integration_EV
code: export_integration_EV(   Survey_Name,   DirNameFile,   variables,   paramnamefile = NA,   ni = 1,   gdepth = 10,   database = 1,   sheet,   ... )

title: export_integration_EVdir — export_integration_EV
text: DirNameFile excel file name paths variables - variables export (name subdirectories variables) paramnamefile optional excel file name parameters export export. column ToExport parameters export.  column NoExport parameters export ni optional argument file start (default ni=1 first file). defaults 1 (EV files) gdepth optional argument cell depth.  gdepth defaults 10 m database optional argument export format.  Default database (1).  Spreadsheet =0 sheet optional argument denote sheet DirNameFile want use. defaults first sheet set. SurveyName name survey excel file

what: read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EVdir_exports
title: read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EVdir_exports
text: Read directory .csv files (can several variables) exported Echoview.   function preserves cells depth. Uses packages readxl, readr, purrr, dplyr.

title: read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EVdir_exports
code: read_EVdir_exports(   SurveyName,   DirNameFile,   database = 1,   exportloc = 1,   sheet = NULL,   ... )

title: read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EVdir_exports
text: SurveyName - name survey DirNameFile excel file - contains paths locations files. Uses Export_dir directory exported files . database optional argument format .csv files .  Default database (1).  Spreadsheet =0 exportloc optional argument using Export_Dir Region_Export_dir column entry DirNameFile spreadsheet.  1 Export_Dir, 0 Region_Export_dir sheet optional argument denote sheet DirNameFile want use. defaults first sheet set.

title: read_EV_exports:  Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EVdir_exports

repath_EVdir.R — repath_EVdir
text: Function take directory EV files reset path. works EV files just EK80 fileset, EK60 file set first fileset, EK80 second fileset. May want eventually convert calling "fileset1" "fileset2" instead EK60 EK80. Written RT 2022. Requires excel file input hat says paths row survey (survey_name), column path file name

title: repath_EVdir.R — repath_EVdir
text: SurveyName name survey excel file DirNameFile excel file name paths ni optional argument file start (default ni=1 first file). Excel file following columns (header names) Cal_File: calibration file name Base_Path: Orig_EV_Dir: Raw_Dir EK80_Cal_File EK80_Raw_Dir

title: repath_EVdir.R — repath_EVdir
code: if (FALSE) { DirNameFile="C:/rthomas/R/Rcode/EK60_EK80 conversion/EK60_Ek80_conv_updated/Directory Structure EK60 EK80 conversion updated.xlsx" SurveyName='2019_US' repath_EVdir(SurveyName,DirNameFile) }
